Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory260.png'}
{3: 'By the time the mourning crowd has departed, Babylonia has hung up the artificial night sky.'}
{3: "Liv's name is marked alongside many others within the code on the war memorial, allowing the visitors to learn about their stories."}
{3: "The lives behind those names, both humans and Constructs, have used their bodies to mend the rifts caused by the war, paving a road for humanity's future."}
{3: 'The brightest day will eventually dusk, the river of time flowing toward a new night.'}
{3: 'History of the world, then, goes back and forth between light and darkness. It had been this way, and it will be this way.'}
{3: 'Underneath the bright, artificial moonlight, all but three remain before the monument.'}
{3: 'They stare at the familiar name in silence, sharing neither tears nor words.'}
{3: 'If the human among them had not passed out before dawn due to having just recovered, they would have stayed there until noon and beyond.'}
{3: 'Heartbroken as they are, they will still visit tomorrow, even when their battles leave them no time to grieve.'}
{3: 'The girl will lie in the eternal winter with countless others, dreaming about what could be as what once was.'}
{3: "There ends her journey. From then, it will be someone else's story."}
{3: 'Becoming a name on the memorial. Building a future with her past.'}
{3: 'History never changes dramatically because of one person, but everyone can use their power to help lay the foundation of a future.'}
{3: 'If the future is filled with difficulties, perhaps it is easiest for her to depart at her most glorious moment, no longer having to suffer any pain.'}
{3: 'Her heart still worries for her companions.'}
{3: 'The algorithm responds to her question and extends the scene onward.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory259.png'}
{3: 'A few days later, she sees a familiar figure.'}
{3: 'It is Lucia.'}
{3: 'Lucia places a sheep plush in front of the memorial before sitting down, as the place is empty at this late hour.'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: 'You look more like a wanderer than a soldier now. Is that how you are sometimes?'}
{3: 'Lucia cannot hear the "past" calling for her. She just sits there, talking to herself.'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: 'Liv, this is the second time I lost a teammate unprepared.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: "I'm sorry, but the day you left... I was so angry. Not at you. I was angry at myself and those who withheld the truth...", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: 'I could tell that it was part of Project Winter. But I only heard the truth about it when I brought you back here.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: "But what happened to you... I don't know a better way.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: "Commandant woke up a few days after you're gone... If you waited a little bit longer before coming for us, would you have lived?", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Lucia shakes her head, answering herself.'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: 'If you had done that, we would lose Lee, Chrome, Changyu, and Sophia.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: 'They were more injured than I was. I was the last one who could still move because they were guarding the way to me.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: 'And... in the end, you helped us destroy the twins.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: "I've been thinking these past few days. If I could go back in time, what could I have done to protect you?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: "...But I can't think of anything that would save you.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: 'Not unless I trade your life with others.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: "But you wouldn't have wanted to see that.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: 'Liv, do you know that Lee...', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Lucia does not continue.'}
{3: 'A while after Lucia has left, another Construct stands before the war memorial.'}
{3: 'He greets her before falling into a long silence as if all he has to say is being said wordlessly.'}
{3: 'He only moves when the timer on his terminal rings, and he looks down, frowning.'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: "I'm here to say goodbye.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'He goes quiet again after that, considering for a moment. In the end, he chooses to leave those words unsaid.'}
{3: 'All he thinks and feels are distilled into a simple goodbye, drifting away into the light casting in the square.'}
{3: 'He never returns after that.'}
{3: 'Has he disappeared, or is his path too far removed from what Liv can anticipate?'}
{3: "Time passes day after day. Every time the commandant and Lucia come to visit together, Liv can see the marks time leaves on the commandant's body."}
{3: 'Later, people begin to mention a snowstorm on the surface. It seems that a very difficult winter is coming.'}
{3: "After that, the commandant's name is put next to Liv's at a memorial service."}
{3: "Then, their names are joined by Lucia's."}
{3: 'Many winters later, a young female Construct stands before the monument, someone Liv does not recognize.'}
{2: 'Cosette', 3: "Do you remember me? I'm Cosette. You saved me when I was a baby.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Cosette', 3: "They told me that my parents thought I'd be a genius. That was why they risked their lives delivering me to you.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: "...No. That wasn't..."}
{2: 'Liv', 3: 'All they wanted was for you to be happy...'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: 'They wanted to give you the choice to choose your future...'}
{3: 'But the young Construct cannot hear Liv. She continues.'}
{2: 'Cosette', 3: "But what have I achieved? I'm just a Support-type Construct that can't do anything well...", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Cosette', 3: 'All of you must be so disappointed if you were here.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: 'Of course not... This is not what they wanted...'}
{2: 'Cosette', 3: 'What were my parents like? Why did they bring me into the world?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Cosette', 3: 'Tell me, please...', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Cosette has lost everyone she held dear this long winter. She no longer has anyone to talk to.'}
{3: 'The young Construct, all alone, talks before the monument, until her words turn into tears.'}
{3: 'As the Construct cries, the scenery around her slowly fades into a thick, white fog.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiNoiseNew.prefab', 2: '2'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiNoiseNew.prefab'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStory/FxUiHuaping.prefab', 2: '2'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory293.png'}
{3: "This is as far as Liv's prediction can reach."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Liv', 3: 'Is this the future I have been looking forward to?', 4: '1'}
{3: 'It is easier to rest eternally in death than to bear all those sufferings and pains.'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: 'But I find it colorless and cold...', 4: '1'}
{3: '"A more painful way, then?"'}
{3: '"If you have your answer..."'}
{3: '"I hope you would not regret this decision."'}
